CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in St. Louis edition of Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 22, 1947, pg. 20, reads: "Complete Carver Week Plans - Standing: Mrs. Goldie Hamilton, the Rev. J. L. Dandridge, Mrs. Eloise Hayes, Dr. Leslie Waters, the Rev. John D. Bright, Mrs. William H. Cannoll Jr., J. Allen Figurel, Donald Carroll, chairman. Seated: Miss Irene Miller, Mrs. Christine Jeffries, Mrs. Virginia Wright, Mrs. David Alter, Judge Lois M. McBride, Miss Myra Adam Johns, Dr. Alma Illery, national chairman.  This committee plans another nation-wide memorial celebration for George Washington Carver in Pittsburgh Jan. 4-11, featuring prominent speakers."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, seated from left: Irene Miller, Christine Jeffries, Virginia Wright, Mrs. David Alter, Judge Lois M. McBride, Myra Adam Johns, Alma Illery; standing: Goldie Hamilton, Rev. J. L. Dandridge, Eloise Hayes, Dr. Leslie Waters, Rev. John D. Bright, Mrs. William H. Cannoll Jr., J. Allen Figurel, and Donald Carroll
